title: A Memorial Day Portfolio
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Memorial Day honors members of the country’s armed forces who gave their lives in the service of their country. It would be fitting to acknowledge the price paid to afford us our freedom in a manner tailored to an investment audience. Specifically, what might a “Memorial Day portfolio” look like? We offer a few suggestions. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
